Wyn Drabble: Protester’s sign at Ardern-Gayford wedding was ‘tasteless, tactless, disrespectful’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-protesters-sign-at-ardern-gayford-wedding-was-tasteless-tactless-disrespectful/DLOL6FGJXFGBFDTJ67RTSL57P4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wyn-drabble-protesters-sign-at-ardern-gayford-wedding-was-tasteless-tactless-disrespectful/DLOL6FGJXFGBFDTJ67RTSL57P4/ Wyn DrabbleI first heard about the protesters when I was in a local service station. Photo / Connull Lang
